subproject.description: Capacity of rule of law institutions strengthened: capacity of Ministry of Justice reviewed and strengthened; support to the Ministry of Justice to the lead the implementation of the National Justice Sector Strategy provided; implementation of the 'Justice for the Future' project ensured; development and implementation of legal aid strategy supported; legislative drafting skills enhanced; public awareness on the Ministry's work raised and access to relevant legal information by the public enhanced; and capacity of the Attorney-General's Office and the High Judicial Council strengthened.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
